title: Innovative Mental Health Nursing Instructional Design in the Pandemic Era: Blended Learning-Based Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and introduction to psychiatric nursing
context.additional_context: A blended mental health nursing education program for pre-service/prospective teachers utilizing digital devices, applying innovative teaching methods considering the pandemic situation.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real clinical scenarios based on major mental health nursing theories (schizophrenia, depression, bipolar disorder, etc.)
Perform mental health nursing interventions with over 80% accuracy through blended learning (flipped classroom, role-play, case studies)
Design learner-customized mental health nursing education scenarios using PBL-developed instructional content
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
